#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"
#include <sstream>

using rrr::Coroutine;
namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });



int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

string debugMultiStr(const MultiStringMarshallable& m) {
  std::ostringstream ss;
  for (int i=0; i<m.data_.size(); i++) {
    ss <<i<<":"<< m.data_[i] << "; ";
  }
  return ss.str();
}


int KvServer::sendCommand(const uint64_t& op_id, shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable>&& cmd, std::function<bool()> cb) {
  auto& raft_ = this->GetRaftServer();
  Log_debug("kv[%d]: send %s", raft_.loc_id_, debugMultiStr(*cmd).c_str());
  uint64_t index, term;
  bool isleader;
  auto cmd_m = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(cmd);
  // wait for the log to be committed
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  wait_ev_[op_id] = ev;
  if (!raft_.Start(cmd_m, &index, &term)){
    ev->Set(1);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  ev->Wait(1250000);
  wait_ev_.erase(op_id);
  raft_.GetState(&isleader, &term);
  if (!isleader) {
    ev->Set(1);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  if (ev->IsReady() && cb()) {
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void place(shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable>& s) {}

template <typename T, typename... Ts>
void place(shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable>& s, T arg, Ts... args) {
  s->data_.emplace_back(std::forward<T>(arg));
  place(s, std::forward<Ts>(args)...);
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid,
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /*
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  place(s, to_string(oid), "put", k, v);
  return sendCommand(oid, std::move(s));
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid,
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  place(s, to_string(oid), "append", k, v);
  return sendCommand(oid, std::move(s));
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid,
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  place(s, to_string(oid), "get", k);
  return sendCommand(oid, std::move(s), [&v, this, k] {
    auto it = kv_store_.find(k);
    if (it == kv_store_.end()) {
      return false;
    }
    *v = it->second;
    return true;
  });
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto cmd = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  Log_debug("[%d]: cb receive: %s", GetRaftServer().loc_id_, debugMultiStr(*cmd).c_str());
  auto op_id = stol(cmd->data_[0]);
  auto op = cmd->data_[1];
  auto k = cmd->data_[2];
  if (op != "get") {
    auto v = cmd->data_[3];
    if (op == "put") {
      kv_store_[k] = v;
    } else {
      if (kv_store_.find(k) == kv_store_.end()) {
        kv_store_[k] = v;
      } else {
        kv_store_[k] += v;
      }
    }
  }
  if (wait_ev_.find(op_id) != wait_ev_.end()) {


    wait_ev_[op_id]->Set(1);
  }
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
